com.sensoro.beacon.kit

类 BaseSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensoro.beacon.kit.BaseSettings

  • public class BaseSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    The beacon setting class,this class can set or get transmit power, advertising interval of the beacon.It also can control energy saving mode, password status.
